background-default.$description: Default background for interactive elements like buttons and inputs in their resting state

lufa.useCase: Button backgrounds, input backgrounds, interactive card backgrounds

background-hover.$description: Background color when hovering over interactive elements - provides visual feedback

lufa.useCase: Hover state for buttons, inputs, cards, list items

background-active.$description: Background color when pressing/clicking interactive elements - provides immediate feedback

lufa.useCase: Active/pressed state for buttons and clickable elements

background-disabled.$description: Background color for disabled interactive elements - indicates non-interactive state

lufa.useCase: Disabled buttons, disabled inputs, non-interactive elements

border-default.$description: Default border color for interactive elements in resting state

lufa.useCase: Input borders, button outlines, card borders

border-hover.$description: Border color when hovering over interactive elements - stronger emphasis

lufa.useCase: Hover state borders for inputs and outlined buttons

border-focus.$description: Border color for focused interactive elements - indicates keyboard focus and accessibility

lufa.useCase: Focus rings, focused input borders, keyboard navigation indicators

border-disabled.$description: Border color for disabled interactive elements - subtle indication of disabled state

lufa.useCase: Disabled input borders, disabled button outlines

text-default.$description: Default text color for interactive elements in resting state

lufa.useCase: Button labels, input text, interactive element labels

text-hover.$description: Text color when hovering over interactive elements - maintains readability

lufa.useCase: Hover state text for buttons and interactive elements

text-active.$description: Text color when pressing/clicking interactive elements

text-disabled.$description: Text color for disabled interactive elements - low contrast indicates non-interactive

lufa.useCase: Disabled button text, disabled input text, non-interactive labels

focus-ring.$description: Color for focus rings around interactive elements - ensures accessibility compliance

lufa.useCase: Focus indicators, keyboard navigation rings, accessibility focus states

focus-ring-offset.$description: Offset distance for focus rings from element edge - improves visibility

lufa.useCase: Focus ring spacing, outline-offset for focused elements
